body.p: To his Excellency Thos E. Bramlette Gov of Ky

your petitioner John Hardin states that at the November term 1863 of the Marion circuit court he with others was indicted by the grand jury of said county and charged with malicious mischief in defacing the Property of one Dr W. R. Mitchell without felonious intent -- Your petitioner respectfully requests your Excellency to release him from liability under said indictment
The undersigned citizens of Marion county cordially join in the above petition --

J. R. Thomas
John Russell
W G Mills
S J Gray Marshall Lebanon
R A Burton
Joseph H Miller
C. W. Gardner
J. A Mattingly
Thos H Payne
Jos H Chandler

Marion Cir Ct
vs
John Hardin
20th Dec/65
